examples.example: 掌握多种语言能让我们更好地与世界交流和沟通。

translate.english: Mastering multiple languages can enable us to communicate and interact with the world better.

examples.example: 学习不同的语言是一件非常有趣且有意义的事情。

translate.english: Learning different languages is a very interesting and meaningful thing.

examples.example: 掌握好语言这门工具，会为我们的生活增添许多乐趣和便利。

translate.english: Mastering the language as a tool will add a lot of fun and convenience to our lives.
